en.ajudaDescricao: Got questions? JIAM AI is ready to help you with all features of the JIAM Predictive system.
en.perguntaConta: How do I create my account?
en.respostaConta: Click 'Register', fill in your details, and confirm via email. Your account will be ready to use.
en.respostaUpload: JIAM Predictive supports CSV, Excel, Parquet and direct integration with real databases.
en.perguntaAnalises: How do I interpret the analyses?
en.respostaAnalises: Graphs and forecasts indicate trends and insights for strategic decisions, with automatic model explanations.
en.perguntaIA: What can AI do for me?
en.respostaIA: JIAM AI answers system questions, interprets data, and suggests actions. When uncertain, it suggests external searches.
